Reviews.Title: Camera didn't work
Reviews.Author: Lewis Arnold
Reviews.Content: I ordered the EOS Rebel T5i along with a wireless shutter release and and eye cup and paid for expedited shipping. The shutter release and eye cup were delivered two days after I placed my order. The camera, however, came regular free shipping and arrived several days later. I paid more for shipping on the two small items than they were worth. To top it off the camera didn't not function properly and I will have to return it and hope that a replacement shows up -- I would have thought that I could have just returned the camera box but apparently have will have to repackage everything to return the malfunctioning box. This was my fourth Cannon Eos Rebel and I love the camera -- the shipping errors and exchange policy, however, have me scratching my head.
